welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hindupur, the charming city known for its rich history, traditional architecture, and vibrant cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Hindupur has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Pavan restaurent
restaurants.description: Pavan restaurent is a comfort food restaurant located in Hindupur.
restaurants.address: Municipal building (Pkd road), Hindupur 515201, Andhra Pradesh
